name: Dead Harvest
description:
Dead Harvest is a Top Down Shooter with a Farm/Zombie Veg theme.

Made by Luke Lawrence, Daniel O'Neil, Geoff Splinter, Ryan Howes and Chris Dixon.

Made in a Group of 5 for year 2 project at University of Cumbria UK.

Destroy the veggies, reclaim your harvest and save the Mrs from the evil BROCZILLA.

Collect weapons, ammo, keys and gather all the seeds for future Harvests. Unlock the level with explosive force and return the farm to sanctuary.

Good Luck
